text: Briesen may refer to the following places: ==In Brandenburg, Germany== *Briesen (Spreewald), in the Spree-Neiße district *Briesen (Mark), in the Oder-Spree district *A part of Friesack, in the Havelland district *A part of Halbe, in the Dahme-Spreewald district ==German alternates== *An older name of Brezno, Slovakia *An older name of Brzeźno, Człuchów in Poland *An older name of Wąbrzeźno, Poland *An older name of Brzeżno, Poland ==Old district== *An old district in West Prussia
title: Briesen
